byline.original: By RAYMOND DANIELL Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Chamberlain faces questioning on campaign handling
snippet: LONDON, May 1--The feeling is growing here that "somebody blundered" in the Norwegian campaign and the government is likely to be asked very soon to say who it was....

headline.main: WAR CRISIS FACES CHAMBERLAIN NOW; Prime Minister Is Expected to Weather It With Reshuffle-- People Are Restless

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 1--The feeling is growing here that "somebody blundered" in the Norwegian campaign and the government is likely to be asked very soon to say who it was.
